entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Testing] Surface testing failures better so we can differentiate between tests and infrastructure. #20483
  • Could not find a driver for automationName 'UIAutomator2' and platformName 'Android' #20482
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [Testing] Expand matrix of devices we are testing for iOS #20481
    Backlog
  • Back button not visible on Android in .net 8 #20480
  • [Testing] Investigate splitting up WinUI tests into separate pipelines. #20479
  • Unable to use UIAdaptivePresentationControllerDelegate events for modal pages #20473
  • AttachAndRun in our tests are very flaky #20470
  • [Proposal] Source generator for `[QueryProperty]` #20466
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Could we cover with tests other conditions that could impact the size? #20465
    Backlog
  • Nested FlexLayouts don't show BackgroundColor #20461

Closed

  • iOS - Label within Border with Background does not display #19259
    Backlog
  • CarouselView - Content disappears when 'Loop' is false and inside ScrollView #19657
    .NET 8 SR3
  • CarouselView layout bugs in iOS #18223
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Cannot connect to mac after updating to VisualStudio 17.8.6 #20450
  • Port to .NET 8: Fix Developer Tools option setting for Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst view #20451
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • VisualTypeConverter loops over all assemblies looking for IVisual types #4937
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add IMediaPicker option that combines PickPhotoAsync and PickVideoAsync so user can select either #20390
  • Android: SecureStorage Adding a value after calling RemoveAll() will not persist the value #19983
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException when I try to start a ForegroundService #15292
  • [Blazor] Maui windows apps can't find _framework/blazor.modules.json #15234

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] ] Update net9.0 with main #20484
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
  • Update Cake #20475
  • [Trimming] Fix remaining trimming warnings related to XAML parsing #20474
  • RadioButton being Garbage Collected #20472
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [iOS][tests] NativeAOT: Do not treat warnings as errors in integration tests #20471
  • Inheriting Visual States #20467
    community ✨
  • [X] Fix XamlCompilation of RD subclasses #20463
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr2] Fix design time image converter #20476
  • [ci] Only run on 17.2 and latest 33 #20455
    area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci
  • Fix design time image converter #20374
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Trimming] Disable assembly scanning for types implementing IVisual #20417
  • Android SecureStorage: Stop caching shared preferences instance to fix RemoveAll #20445
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr2' into `main` #20456

Updated

  • Appshell item template #18615
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, stale
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 SR3
  • utsav9904:#19458 i solve this to gone to the code #20172
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Gather iOS device logs after running tests #20458
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
  • Adding a test to validate loading images #20147
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR3
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Remove allocation from Color.TryParse #20446
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, area/ListView
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
